text: William Edward Peter Louis Drummond-Murray of Mastrick (24 November 1929 - 13 April 2014) was a Scottish herald, Private Officer of Arms and banker. He was appointed Slains Pursuivant of Arms in 1982. He was born in Littlehampton, Sussex. Drummond died in Edinburgh, Scotland, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Slains on line Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Scottish businesspeople Category:People from Sussex
title: Peter Drummond-Murray of Mastrick
